page.title: 13INDUSTRY
page.content: The potato Stores have been in use for 40 years,the average age of a worker is 30 years old.The most common potato they grow is the {MARIS PIPER. The store was built specially for the potatoes.The average weight of the potatoes that they bring in a day in the season is 120 tons. The people that work there are 10 on a normal working day and 90 on a working season.We asked three men how long they have been working there,one of them said 5yrs the other 6yrs and the other 18yrs.Before the potato stores there was just one shed,the shed there was used as a stable.
